channel.title: File-Server on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in File-Server on Arrans github.io

item.title: 9001/copyparty
item.description: Portable file server with accelerated resumable uploads, dedup, WebDAV, SFTP, FTP, TFTP, zeroconf, media indexer, thumbnails++ all in one file

item.title: no-src/gofs
item.description: A cross-platform real-time file synchronization tool out of the box based on Golang
